titles.title: Build up the house of the Lord together

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Build up the house of the Lord together,
Build up the house of the Lord with all your heart;
Labour not for those things that fade away,
Labour one and all for the house.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thy watchmen shall lift up
Their voice unto the Lord,
And with one heart
Together they shall sing in Zion,
For they shall see eye to eye, eye to eye
For they shall see eye to eye
